<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>true</before>
        <description>Modify existing requirement to all employee requirements, changing field requirement_for to employee for all existing records.

Change all existing sn_imt_core_health_and_safety_user records to employee type records.</description>
        <name>Set existing users and requirements </name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var requirementGr = new GlideRecord('sn_imt_core_health_and_safety_requirement');
requirementGr.setValue('requirement_for', 'employee');
requirementGr.setWorkflow(false);
requirementGr.updateMultiple();

var healthAndSafetyGr = new GlideRecord('sn_imt_core_health_and_safety_user');
healthAndSafetyGr.addActiveQuery();
healthAndSafetyGr.addNotNullQuery("user");
healthAndSafetyGr.setValue("type", "employee");
requirementGr.setWorkflow(false);
healthAndSafetyGr.updateMultiple();
]]></script>
